mapper.select: SELECT a.*, m.loginId, m.email, m.authLevel, m.name, m.nickname, m.profileImgUrl FROM article a LEFT OUTER JOIN `member` m ON a.memberLoginId = m.loginId WHERE a.id=#{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberLoginId = #{memberLoginId}, typeId = #{typeId}, privateType = #{privateType}
